post.description: This API creates a root category (i.e., parent category) in your knowledge base.

post.summary: Move articles and trash a root category
post.description: This API moves all articles to another section and trashes this section in your helpdesk

This API adds moderators to a root category in your helpdesk.

_Note_:
Moderators act as designated agents within the primary department with access to the Moderation Panel. They are responsible for reviewing and managing comments awaiting approval or flagged as spam.

post.description:
This API removes moderators from a root category in your helpdesk.

_Note_:
Moderators act as designated agents within the primary department with access to the Moderation Panel. They are responsible for reviewing and managing comments awaiting approval or flagged as spam.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption:
Checks whether the user is a review owner. If the value is:
  • "true" - it returns a list of users who are reviewers.
  • "false" - it returns a list of users who are non-reviewers.

Note: If this param is not provided, all users associated with a specific root category will be listed.
Key that filters agents based on their activation status: @ACTIVE@ or @DISABLED@

Checks whether the user is a moderator. If the value is:
  • "true" - it returns a list of users who are moderators.
  • "false" - it returns a list of users who are non-moderators.

Note: If this param is not provided, all users associated with a specific root category will be listed.

departmentId.description: ID of the department in which the tickets must be created

assigneeId.description: ID of the user to whom the tickets must be assigned. If you do not pass a value for this key, the ticket remains unassigned.

status.description: Activation status of auto-conversion for the category. Values allowed are: ENABLED and DISABLED

isOldPermalinkNeeded.description: The variable that defines if permalink needs to be added to redirect list. By default, it is true

articleViewType.description: View to apply while listing help articles. Values allowed are: LISTVIEW and OVERVIEW.

visibility.description: Visibility setting of the category. Values allowed are: AGENTS, GROUP_USERS, ALL_USERS, NONE, and PRIVATE_IP.

description.description: A brief description of the category

isReviewEnabled.description: Key that specifies whether the category must be reviewed or not

moderationType.description: Type of moderation applied to the category. Values allowed are: @NONE@, @ALL_ACTION@, @FIRST_ACTION@

primaryDepartmentId.description: ID of the department to which the category belongs

logoId.description: ID of the logo to set for the category

articlePermission.description: To update the article permission based on category visibility

targetCategoryId.description: Category Id to which articles need to be moved

isOldPermalinkNeeded.description: The variable that defines if permalink needs to be added to redirect list. By default, it is true

moderationType.description: Type of moderation applied to the category. Values allowed are: @NONE@, @ALL_ACTION@, @FIRST_ACTION@
